reviews.text: Love this beach. Miles of beauty. Small parking lot so it doesn't get crowded! Arrive before 8 am and you'll be one of the lucky ones to get a spot. Beautiful scenery. Pine trees & the ocean!!
Nice back by the campground. Caught some fish offshore in a kayak.

Probably the best beach in New England.  Very small parking lot, so if you get in it's like winning the lottery. It feels like a tropical island. Not crowded (trade off for a small parking lot). Huge waves. Gradual water entry. Limited bathrooms. No showers. Overall amazing beach, a must visit!!!
Best kept secret. Oops, it is out now!
Bill and I had a awesome time at the beach! Thank you so much Aunt Jan and Uncle Richy! 💯got my zen back! Can't wait for the next time. 👣☺❤
Waves were huge and beautiful.   The beach itself was super clean, not a bit of trash anywhere.   Love going there.

It was a nice beach, it cost $20 to get in but there was nothing to do there. We came from CT. & would of liked to been able to take a walk to some stores or get something to eat or maybe have some water activities available. It was clean & they have bathrooms. The waves were awesome so it depends on what u want to do. There are other beaches close by that offer more

I love this beach and have been coming here for 25 years. In all that time I have never experienced what happened today. It was 90 degrees, sunny, light wind, perfect beach day! The whole beach was full of nasty biting flies,  like small horse flies. We'r couldn't get away from them except by going in the nice refreshing water.  However once in the sea we could feel little pellets catching in our fingers. They were like clear globules of jelly. Not sure what they were but it was unpleasant.

Very clean and beautiful beach. It gets really busy but it is well organized.  The beach is open till 9pm but the main restrooms close at 4:45.  You can use the portopoties after 4:45.  My son loved running into the water but the waves are relatively strong for toddlers so stay close to them.  Parking lot gets full fast so get there early or be patient for spaces to open up.
Love this beach. Big waves and nice sand. They have bathrooms too.
Grecian Delight is one of the best pizzas I have had in my life! Careful, internet prices do not reflect actual retail prices.
Friendly waitress cashier but my Hawaiian pizza partially melted the waxpaper it was served on...eww.

Excellent pizza. Very busy and popular. Lucky to get a table.
A real pizzeria! Loved it😆
Great food great service best pizza ever 🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕
The best buffalo chicken calzone you'll ever eat😍😍
Grecian Delight is one of the best pizzas I have had in my life! Careful, internet prices do not reflect actual retail prices.
Friendly waitress cashier but my Hawaiian pizza partially melted the waxpaper it was served on...eww.

Excellent pizza. Very busy and popular. Lucky to get a table.
A real pizzeria! Loved it😆
Great food great service best pizza ever 🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕
The best buffalo chicken calzone you'll ever eat😍😍
Real chocolates made by hand is always a great recipe. Try them once and you will be back.
This place is so sweet. Chocolate is delicious. Candy canes at Christmas. Even sugar free candy and chocolates. And yes,  the people are friendly and helpful too.
This family owned shop has been a dependable creator of delicious chocolate for a long time. Very hard to make a decision!

Great chocolate! From boxed assortments to truffles that sell by the piece or make up a box. Great shapes for kids and adults - seashells, lobsters, Santas, cars & trucks.....
Jelly beans, sour gummies, chocolate pretzels....dive in and enjoy!
A beautiful aroma filled chocolate shop with any shape, size or color of chocolate. Many many gifts for people on your gift list.
Get there really early during on-season hours. Pastry and bagels go quick! My favorite stop for muffins and scones while vacationing in Charlestown area!! Great Staff! Patron since 2015.
Great products and services. Gorgeous gal at the register! Win win win

Lovely little bakery! The staff is super friendly and the baked goods are top notch! I got a raspberry almond muffin - and as a muffin connoisseur - I can tell you it’s in the the top 3 on my list. Would go back— and pick up a dozen! (Stellar coffee too!)
Food is fresh . Customer service stellar.  Coffee baristas brew good coffee.
Good food. Amazing iced coffee!

I secretly judge all italian sandwiches off theirs. It's not quite a grinder, but it got all the components and it's delicious. Call in to order for pick up and grab your chips and drinks when you get there, it'll make your day easier.

Decent sandwich, no BH! Fresh produce. Nice & fresh sides. 
Although it's never open. Has seasonal hours of operation only. But, never open. If their open stop in.
Always good sandwiches here with a great variety of breads.

Friendly people, fresh food, good price. The owner is very nice and hilarious, too. In my opinion, it's a must-visit for lunch in Charlestown. Pick up some ice cream or knickknacks next door, too. Beware though, they're only open in the summer.

I think that they should teach their cooks how to fry up clam cakes.  They were a very dark brown when they came to my table.  When I mentioned it to the waitress about 10 minutes in to my dinner she went back to the kitchen and they were going to make me another batch.  I think not!  The order should have been done right in the first place.  I was not looking for a free meal and the waitress was tipped $4 on a $16 tab. I personally would never go there again.  The place may be nice for breakfast but I think I will stick to other places for dinner.

Very small shower with no bathtub in room 8.  Had special needs child with us that doesn't take showers.  Had trouble getting cold water.  But it was a nice place to stay! Spent 3 days there.  We would stay again.
Great place to stay. Friendly staff
Great room, very welcoming,  clean, fresh and friendly love it

I went to Rhode island for first-time fell in love with the place rooms were clean stayed here because it was close to Nordic and beach brought my two Jack Russell's and they enjoyed watching rabbits. Rooms might be tight for larger dog  Debbie the owner made our stay fantastic we will be back next year.Thanks Debbie see you soon
Very great stay.
